casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee FOR STRUCTURED ASSET SECURITIES CORPORATION, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-BC6, a national banking association, Appellant,
v.
Anthony BORGERT, an individual, Respondent. No. 73487 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 30, 2018

DISMISSED.
